    • getMyShips

      public static void getMyShips(int[][] field, File file, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, javafx.scene.image.Image[] images) throws IOException
      get ships wrote in file and set corresponding images on its place
      Parameters:
      field - field to fill with information of file
      file - file contains information about set ships
      gridPane - GridPane to set images on
      images - array of ships images
      Throws:
      IOException - file can be not found

    • myFieldToLabel

      public static void myFieldToLabel(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane myField) throws IOException, URISyntaxException
      convert information from GridPane with images to numbers written in file
      Parameters:
      myField - GridPane with set images
      Throws:
      IOException - file can be not made
      URISyntaxException - file can be not found

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      whether all ships are used or not

    • isBroken

      public static boolean isBroken(String stringShipInfo, javafx.scene.control.Label[][] enemyShipsLabel)
      check does ship has been broken
      Parameters:
      stringShipInfo - sting contains information about number of desks, row, column of ship
      enemyShipsLabel - label has image if there was shot
      Returns:
      whether the ship is broken or not

    • isBrokenEnemy

      public static void isBrokenEnemy(ArrayList<String> brokenShips, javafx.scene.control.Label[][] myShipsLabel, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane myFieldGrid, int[] amountOfHit)
      calls another method if ship is broken to fill with empty cells space around the ship
      Parameters:
      brokenShips - array contains information about shots hit in ships
      myShipsLabel - label contains images
      myFieldGrid - GridPane contains labels with images
      amountOfHit - amount of shots hit in ship
